item.description:
"Women In Bio-Greater Boston Area Professionals and Executives in the Life Science Industry" Meet-Up
When: June 19, 2012 | 4:00 pm - 5:00 pm

Where: Boston Convention & Exhibition Center, BIO Bar hosted by Biogen Idec, North Lobby
Learn more on http://mybio.zerista.com/event/member/47391.

This informal gathering is open to all BIO attendees, although it is designed especially for the Boston area and will provide an informal setting for current and prospective WIB-Greater Boston chapter members to meet industry peers and discuss professional interests.
item.name: "Women In Professionals and Executives in the Life Sciences"
